About Belinda

Web engineer focused on performant, accessible builds for agencies and growth-minded business owners.

Principles

A framework for every engagement

Years inside agencies, in-house teams, and as an independent partner taught me what keeps projects calm and on track.

01

Systems thinking

Tool-agnostic component libraries and documentation so any contributor can jump in without guessing.

02

Accessibility first

Keyboard flows, semantic markup, and content guidance are baked into the base scope, not add-ons.

03

Transparent ops

Loom walkthroughs, shared decision logs, and weekly recaps keep everyone aligned asynchronously.
